website_summaries.verdict: This rugged vape travel case helps safeguard your vape accessories against rain, sleet, snow, and other inclement weather conditions.
pros: Waterproof case is expertly constructed from top-of-the-line nylon for supreme quality
Provides plenty of space for your vape accessories, along with your cell phone and other items
Works great as a vape case and a camping or hiking bag
Available in a variety of eye-catching colors
cons: Military-style case may be less than ideal for those who want a fashionable, vibrant case

customer_reviews.title: Updated review-1 month and its already ripped inside the pouch. Disappointed but it was cheap
customer_reviews.text: Updated review on 12-4-19 only 1 month since first review. Already ripping inside!!!! And I don't wear it all the time. Totally disappointed but I guess you get what you paid for. So far I'm so i excited for this pouch. I got it to hold my atomizer for vaping. My atomizer kept tipping over in my purse leaving the juice everywhere which, mind you, isn't easy to get out. This pouch is just the right size, material's light weight but strong and it hangs on my belt perfectly at work. I can also fit my phone in it. I hope it holds up. M
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Well made, versatile, functional, perfect storage pouch
customer_reviews.text: This pouch is well made, water resistant and has perfect features. I can wear it on my belt, secure to my pack, and even wear it around my neck using some para-cord. There is plenty of room for my wallet, keys, phone, vape gear and more. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: unkown

customer_reviews.title: I use this as a phone and wallet pouch.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a phone and wallet pouch while playing airsoft/paintball. Fits a large IPhone 8 plus. It can be usefully used as a vape kit, small first aid kit, phone and wallet holder, or used as a wallet, as well as any other small pocket nicnaks you would find yourself carrying around daily.
customer_reviews.author: BrickyardDrifter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little pouch! It has become my every day carry. It holds my wallet, credit cards, gift cards, hearing aid batteries, knife, cash, coupons, etc. I’m ordering another in a different color now. (I originally bought this to hold my vape pen. Turns out I prefer having my pen in my shirt pocket. Win/win)
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Bridge Vmd

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor purse
customer_reviews.text: I like the compartments and size. Zippers work well. I use this when I hike short distances. I put this on my pistol belt for emergency items. I do not like this straps for belt wear. They have Velcro that comes apart sometimes. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Fus

customer_reviews.title: Everything fit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a black and a green bag. My husband and I love them! We keep our vape pens and all accessories. I even have room for my cell phone. I am able to hook mine to my purse when we are out and about. When I am on a short trip I can detach and cary everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: skithetrees

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected, that's OK.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected, but nice item, will hold more things. Several attachment options.
customer_reviews.author: George Kelso Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great.
customer_reviews.text: Has turned into my portable hip mounted random things tool kit. I add more stuff from time to time. It's great to be prepared. I've got a voltage tester, flashlight, zip ties, hose clamps, gloves, wire nuts, wet wipes, head lamp, credit cards, lighter, electrical tape, loctite tape, tactical pen.... the list grows.
customer_reviews.author: M. REYNOLDS

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I used it to strap to my pack and carry my phone and a little notebook. It works well. And I've never felt like it was gonna fall off or anything like that. I haven't 100% tested it other than walking in light rain and stuff but the inside of the pouch makes it seem almost like it would be water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: ValhallasDemise

customer_reviews.title: Very nice molle pouch
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pouch. Sturdy. Came with a free pen and a D carbine clip. Also had a strap as well. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ish

customer_reviews.title: Made of good material. Works well
customer_reviews.text: Made of good material. Works well. Fits what I need it to fit and holds what I needed to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space
customer_reviews.text: Great pouch. Mod, juice bottle and extra batteries fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Nice pouch
customer_reviews.text: Has a good amount of room. My Samsung phone will not fit in the front pocket. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Odie0260

customer_reviews.title: It's a great bag not to big or to small
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bag not to big or to small. I love the material it won't rip or let your stuff get wet. It'll carries everything I need plus more. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: sherry Smith

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE 👍👌
customer_reviews.text: It looks to be well made and of good quality material. Room for two smart phones and a flip phone on the outside. Even a pen holder. Be a good little bag for hiking .
customer_reviews.author: Loner

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for keeping all my vape stuff in
customer_reviews.text: Very quality bag. Very useful for keeping all my vape stuff in. It's very spacious. I keep a 30 ml bottle of juice, 4 batteries inside containers, my big vape with two extra atomizers, my little suorin air with an extra cartriage, a cable, and a little microfiber towel. I love it
customer_reviews.author: richard k.

customer_reviews.title: The article arrived on time only that it is not complete, or is not as described.
customer_reviews.text: The article arrived on time only that it is not complete, or is not as described.
customer_reviews.author: María Elena

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Got it just in time for the 420 event I was going too and this is something you need, so you don't have to carry everything or out anything in your pocket! Good for your vape, juice, battery pack, even your phone! 🤘
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Quality case!
customer_reviews.text: Use this to carry 2 100mil bottles, batteries, atomizers, spare coils the works! Fits everything with room for more. Quality zippers that dont snag, very durable material, can even double as a backpack for a squirrel!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my phone
customer_reviews.text: Its a good pouch. My J7 fits perfectly along with other things too(charger, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: It’s really good and it’s fit to my all vaping staff ( ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s really good and it’s fit to my all vaping staff ( DNA Paranormal, 2 Batteries, 2 juices 60ml, and cotton and it’s have more space, recommend for vapors
customer_reviews.author: ibrahem ishaq

customer_reviews.title: Great if you dont want to carry a purse around
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, it came in handy for vape, phone and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: susan coyle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for a great price. It's a sure win ordering this.
customer_reviews.author: Gino

customer_reviews.title: Great for Vapers and more
customer_reviews.text: It is a good pouch , I put my G-Priv kit , cellphone, few cards, it fits good. I take it when i go out.Good price, really worth it !!! Love it...... Great for Vapers
customer_reviews.author: Bilal Thabet

product_meta.title: Multi-Purpose EDC Vape Pouch Bag, Vape Case,Tactical Bag Pouch, Military Nylon Utility Tactical Waist Pack Camping Hiking Pouch (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackIbreathtech Waist bag for cellphone and vape box mod.

1. SIZE: 4.72"x6.9"x2.4" (12x17.5x6cm)
2. MATARIAL: 1000D Cordura nylon .
3. Weight: 120g
4. Packing list: 1pc waist bag

*How to carry your big multiple cell phones? 
*How to carry your many different accessories when you go to work or outdoor? 
*Are you looking for the Most Lightweight, Multi-Purpose, Durable and Portable Pouch with Unbeatable Price? 

!!!!!!This Ibreathtech molle pouch would meet all your demands!!!!!!

$———This EDC molle pouch have a molle system on back, you can use it with other molle military tactical bag, backpack etc. Compact EDC Pouch Tool Waist Bag is perfect for Wallet, Iphone 7 Plus, Samsung, Pen, Tool and Power Bank etc. 1000D Nylon fabric, Waterproof, Wear-resisting and lightweight.
$———This molle pouch is a great organizer for big screen smart phone, camera, key, wallet, pen, knife, notebook, small tool etc small accessories, and even can be a holster. It's a ideal molle bag, tactical waist bag or gadget pouch. Inside the bag are two large zippered compartments for other items, such as a wallet, second phone, portable battery charger, sunglasses, and other items Durable material with pad keeps your cellphone and other electronic devices safe and protected. It is indeed an excellent product. Suitable for outdoor sports, hiking,climbing,hunting,camping mountaineering.

Thank you for your trust. Enjoy it !
